name: pouty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe lips that are pushed forward, especially because someone is intentionally doing this in order to look more sexually attractive: She has big eyes and pouty lips. pouty supermodels
annoyed or easily becoming annoyed, especially when you show this by pushing your lips forward: Behind the facade of self-confidence, there is a complicated person, all pouty and petulant and racked with doubt and anxiety.
